include_link_html.description: Indicate whether to scrape the link and include the raw HTML of the link associated with this search result in the 'link_html' field
include_link_html.title: Include Link HTML

include_link_text.description: Indicate whether to scrape the link and include the text of the link associated with this search result in the 'link_text' field
include_link_text.title: Include Link Text

top_k.description: The number of results to return for each query
top_k.title: Top K
